channel.title: Starter

item.title: Starter
item.dc:creator: @sspoke sspoke
item.description:
@sspoke wrote:

you have 2 options you pick which one looks better on the eyes, they both do the same thing.
either

if(!hasStarter) {
...
}

or

if(hasStarter == false) {
...
}

Note the top one looks and feels better.

But the reason why

if(hasStarter = false) {

never worked is because using one equals sign always makes hasStarter to be false
but if you use 2 equals signs then you are checking to see if it equals that.

Just remember one equal to set value and two equals to check value.

Read full topic

item.title: Starter
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Skrillex_Craft, post:5, topic:535788”]get owned?

green = add

if (hasStarter [color=]= false[/color]); {
getItems().addItem(1351,1);
getItems().addItem(590,1);
getItems().addItem(1265,1);
getItems().addItem(1052,1);
getItems().addItem(1277,1);
getItems().addItem(841,1);
getItems().addItem(882,50);
getItems().addItem(556,100);
getItems().addItem(558,100);
sendMessage(“Welcome to Demolitionx”);
teleportToX = 2757;
teleportToY = 3477;
sendMessage(“Owner is ‘Mod Deven’.”);
sendMessage(“Teleports are ::camelot and ::lumbridge”);
sendMessage(“Server Version: Beta”);
hasStarter = true;

=

if (!hasStarter) {
getItems().addItem(1351,1);
getItems().addItem(590,1);
getItems().addItem(1265,1);
getItems().addItem(1052,1);
getItems().addItem(1277,1);
getItems().addItem(841,1);
getItems().addItem(882,50);
getItems().addItem(556,100);
getItems().addItem(558,100);
sendMessage(“Welcome to Demolitionx”);
teleportToX = 2757;
teleportToY = 3477;
sendMessage(“Owner is ‘Mod Deven’.”);
sendMessage(“Teleports are ::camelot and ::lumbridge”);
sendMessage(“Server Version: Beta”);
hasStarter = true;[/quote]
Should i go through this one more time…
Just for you…

if (!hasStarter) { getItems().addItem(1351,1); getItems().addItem(590,1); getItems().addItem(1265,1); getItems().addItem(1052,1); getItems().addItem(1277,1); getItems().addItem(841,1); getItems().addItem(882,50); getItems().addItem(556,100); getItems().addItem(558,100); sendMessage("Welcome to Demolitionx"); teleportToX = 2757; teleportToY = 3477; sendMessage("Owner is 'Mod Deven'."); sendMessage("Teleports are ::camelot and ::lumbridge"); sendMessage("Server Version: Beta"); hasStarter = true; }
See the bang symbol? No? Here, let me enhance it... [quote] if ([size=36pt]![/size]hasStarter) { getItems().addItem(1351,1); getItems().addItem(590,1); getItems().addItem(1265,1); getItems().addItem(1052,1); getItems().addItem(1277,1); getItems().addItem(841,1); getItems().addItem(882,50); getItems().addItem(556,100); getItems().addItem(558,100); sendMessage("Welcome to Demolitionx"); teleportToX = 2757; teleportToY = 3477; sendMessage("Owner is 'Mod Deven'."); sendMessage("Teleports are ::camelot and ::lumbridge"); sendMessage("Server Version: Beta"); hasStarter = true; }

Read full topic
